roleset.name: display a bias

roles.note: This frame differs from the verb frame in its inclusion of arg2 and arg3. These roles could just as easily apply to the verb.

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: Obviously I am biased as I am an independant mortgage adviser but...
example.arg: as I am an independant mortgage adviser

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Maybe I was biased by the tenderness of the pork but the beef still seemed tough and I found myself washing some bites down with my reasonably priced $2.50 wine.
example.arg: by the tenderness of the pork

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The BBC are biased against America , and therefore Israel .
